Pre-Game Insights: Bryan Reynolds and the Pittsburgh Pirates will face Luis Garcia and the Washington Nationals on September 7, 2024, at 1:35 p.m. ET in the second game of a four-game series at PNC Park.
The Pirates have been listed as -124 moneyline favorites against the Nationals (+104).
Pittsburgh is a 1.5-run favorite with +162 odds.
The over/under for the game has been set at 8.5 runs.
